DataElement.preferredDefinition: the range related to the process of classifying patients into strata as part of the randomization process or for purposes of data analysis based on age.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: information related to the process of classifying patients into strata as part of the randomization process or for purposes of data analysis based on age.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredDefinition: A period or stage in life, usually stated in years since birth.:The process of classifying patients into strata as part of the randomization process or for purposes of data analysis.

Concepts.definition: How long something has existed; elapsed time since birth.
The process of classifying patients into a sequence of grades or ranks as part of the randomization process or for purposes of data analysis.

DataElementConcept.origin: NCCTG CRF:North Central Cancer Treatment Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: the age range used in the process of classifying patients into strata as part of the randomization process or for purposes of data analysis.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: Age Greater than or equal to 50

A statement about the relative size or order of two objects specifying that an object of interest is smaller than another object in quantity or measure or value or status.: A natural number greater than fifty-nine and less than sixty-one and the quantity that it denotes.: A natural number greater than 4 and less than 6 and the quantity that it denotes: the sum of four and one.
